question: On Monday, Michael wants to exercise for five times the amount of time he did on Sunday and Saturday combined. On Saturday he exercised for 31 minutes. On Sunday he exercised for 32 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Monday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Saturday and Sunday he exercised a total of 63 minutes because 31 + 32 = <<31+32=63>>63
On Monday he has to exercise for 315 minutes because 63*5 = <<63*5=315>>315
#### 315
